text: Ma asị m unu, na onye ọbụla nke na-ewe iwe megide nwanna ya, na-enyefe onwe ya nʼaka ikpe. Onye ọbụla nke na-akpọ nwanna ya ‘Raka,’ ya bụ Onye iberiibe,5:22 Ọfọ ogori, nʼokwu nlelị anya ga-aza ajụjụ nʼụlọikpe. Ọzọkwa, onye ọbụla nke kpọrọ nwanne ya,5:22 Nke a pụtara nwanna nʼime Kraịst ‘Onye nzuzu,’5:22 Maọbụ, Onye na-enweghị uche na-edo onwe ya ịba nʼọkụ ala mmụọ.
